name: Purgatorio
description:
Purgatorio is a game which seeks to answer a simple question: what happens to pumpkins when they die? Follow a pumpkin protagonist on a Halloween journey through three layers of the afterlife on a quest to find your final resting place.

  • Avoid traps and enemies as you traverse the graveyard landscapes of Purgatorio. 
  • Encounter a trickster god in an innocuous disguise and do their bidding (or do not.)
  • Fight back against witches that torment you during the last leg of your journey.

Made as a final project for AET 334F Video Game Scripting I at the University of Texas at Austin. 

Music: Ghost Processional by Kevin Macleod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
